Description: Book of the Dead of Ankhwahibra; frame 28; Hieratic text with black line vignette.
Curator's comments: To be published by Svenja Guelden (University of Mainz). Bibliography: Wüthrich, A., Édition synoptique et traduction des chapitres supplémentaires du Livre des Morts 162 à 167 (Studien zu Altägyptischen Totentexten 19,1, 2). Wiesbaden 2015. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (23)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 14)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57267) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57267)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: delaminating, frayed, brittle, abraded, fragile, salt precipitate Black ink: abraded, loss Red ink: abraded, loss Supported locally: linen, brown paper patches, Japanese paper Transferred to horizontal storage 9 FEB 95 Removed from horizontal storage 2010 after conservation. Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: poor
